dc.title: ATSDR - Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry / U.S. Dept. of Health and Human Services
dc.description: The Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry (ATSDR) is an agency of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services charged under the Superfund Act to assess the presence and nature of health hazards at specific Superfund sites and to help prevent or reduce further exposure and the illnesses that result from such exposures.
dc.subject: Toxic Substances
